author: Kelen M
title: Fukushima Radiation Destroys 7th Robot
text:
Fukushima Radiation Destroys 7th Robot Attempts to fix the leaking reactor continue to fail The Alex Jones Show - February 21, 2017 Comments 
Fukushima has destroyed its seventh robot and it appears that the reactor leak is showing no signs of improvement.
